data.text: Muwulirize mmwe abantu ba Isirayiri ekigambo kino eky’ennaku ekibakwatako.
“Isirayiri embeerera agudde
Bw’ati bw’ayogera Mukama Katonda nti,
Bw’ati bw’ayogera Mukama eri ennyumba ya Isirayiri nti,
Temunnoonyeza Beseri
Munoonye Mukama munaabanga balamu
Mmwe abantu ba Isirayiri abafuula obwenkanya okuba eky’okufumwa obufumwa
Oyo eyakola ettendo eriri mu mmunyeenye ezaaka ng’ebizungirizi
Okutemya n’okuzibula aleeta okuzikirira ku b’amaanyi
Mukyawa abalamuzi abasalawo mu bwenkanya
Olinnyirira omwavu,
Ebibi byammwe mbimanyi,
Noolwekyo oyo alina amagezi kyaliva asirika obusirisi mu biseera ng’ebyo
Munoonyenga okukola obulungi, so si obubi
Mukyawe ekibi, mwagalenga ekirungi
Noolwekyo bw’ati bw’ayogera Mukama Katonda ow’Eggye nti,
Walibaawo okukaaba mu buli nnimiro ya mizabbibu
Zibasanze mmwe abasuubira
Olunaku olwo lulibeera ng’omusajja adduka empologoma
Olunaku lwa Mukama, teruliba kizikiza awatali kitangaala n’akatono,
Nkyawa, era nnyooma embaga zammwe n’emikolo gyammwe egy’eddiini
Weewaawo, ne bwe munaawaayo gye ndi ebiweebwayo byammwe ebyokebwa n’ebiweebwayo eby’emmere ey’empeke,
Muggyeewo ennyimba zammwe ez’okutendereza.
Kye njagala okulaba ge mazima n’obwenkanya nga bikulukuta ng’amazzi,
“Mwandeeteranga ssaddaaka n’ebiweebwayo mu ddungu
Muyimusizza essabo lya kabaka wammwe,
Kyendiva mbawaŋŋangusa okusukka Ddamasiko,”
